conbody.p: You can sort the table by column. Click the column header to sort the data in ascending or descending order.

To easily find information, you can also filter the data by typing any text in the Filter field. The text can contain any information: number of systems, customer name, channel name, or region. Once you start typing in the Filter field, the table is automatically updated with the matching data.

step.cmd: Click on your user name in the top-right corner.
Look up the user by scrolling in the table or by searching for the user in the Search user box.
